title: Police: Multiple people shot Sunday outside Harrisburg community center
content:
HARRISBURG - Harrisburg police are investigating a shooting outside a city community center that sent multiple people to the hospital this weekend.
It happened just after midnight Sunday near the intersection of North 16th and Walnut streets. Officers responded for a report of one person shot, but when they arrived, they were directed to the area of Walnut and Hoerner streets for a report of shots fired.
